manager.name: Mike the manager
dialog: Hey what's going on dude? You need this key?
I'm pretty busy right now. You want the key to the studio?

maintenance lady.name: Kate the maintenance lady
dialog: I'm so sick of fixing these old machines. You do it!
Mikes cheaping out on these equipments. I'm done fixing them. Wrench is right there, you do it.

gymbro.name: Chad
dialog: I'm trying to get these gainzz bro. GTFO.
This is my machine bro. Make me move.
